content: disney inspired christmas decoration set - 4 mickey and minnie style hanging baubles these are super easy and quick to make suitable for a relative beginner as it only requires single_crochet stitches - but with a little back loops working materials required aran yarn black red and yellow 3 5mm crochet hook stitch markers optional yarn needle ribbon or twine for hanging stitch knowledge required single_crochet = single_crochet invdec = invisible decrease decrease = single_crochet decrease ** = a repeating stitch pattern
